message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics without a non-disclosure agreement, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a significant investment, but I believe the potential return will be well worth it. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
